content.question: The function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals log subscript 2 x"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>x</mi></math>. What input value in the domain of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> yields an output value of <math alttext="4"><mn>4</mn></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
